channel.title: Clan Chat
channel.description: Ok, so I added clan chat to my server(client sided) and its working successfully. When I click the tab it goes to the correct tab, but how do i get the clan chat picture on the tab. Please somebody point me in the right direction. Thanks, Stoneboyjosh

item.title: Clan Chat

item.description:
@stoneboyjosh wrote:

Ok, so I added clan chat to my server(client sided) and its working successfully. When I click the tab it goes to the correct tab, but how do i get the clan chat picture on the tab. Please somebody point me in the right direction.
Thanks,
